div.div:
jayson - April 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 7.0
worth buying
well, this costs 94p and is worth buying. more live wallpapers like this would be great. will be keeping an eye on this dev. thankyou for a great live wallpaper...still can't find the bloody easter egg...

Pestilence - April 8, 2012 - HTC EVO Shift 4G with version 7.0
Love it!
I was so close! Just didn't have the right flame colors for the left & right side. Wasn't as easy as 1 might have thought. Had my friends & I stump'd. This LWP works perfect on EVO shift 4G! Tho I would love to see new backgrounds or demons n the future. Well worth the money as is. Great job!

Sean - April 14, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 7.0
awesome
this is great been looking for a good wallpaper that doesn't lag my phone to much and looks awesome like this download you won't be disappointed

Byron - June 7, 2012 - Version 7.0
Torment
This is by far the best lwp i have had the honor to own on my android phone. Looking forward to seeing what else ur twisted yet brillant minds can conjure

demented - April 7, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 7.0
Awesome
Worth it! Hey maybe add a feature to slow down the flames?

Rosalio - May 19, 2012 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 7.0
Firefightermedic55
Fantastic!! The collaboration of forms of flames, demon and souls...it speaks volumes...it comforts me...brings me back to the real thing that I live and see everyday...thank you for your dedication to your work.

Daryl - April 10, 2012 - ZTE X500 with version 7.0
Great dwnld!
When i saw the free version i absolutely HAD to have the full!

lizzie - April 19, 2012 - Version 7.0
Sweet!
Totally love my Torment wallpaper. Everyone asks where I got it and says it's cool.

Josh - June 3, 2012 - Version 7.0
Awesome
Love this app BUT it would be EVEN BETTER if you could control the speed of the flames. At the current speed it becomes overwhelming and causes a headache.

Donnie - May 18, 2012 - Version 7.0
Background
It be a super idea to make a custom feature that could add ur own pictures instead if the demon other than that this is a awesome add-on

June 26, 2012 - Motorola Droid 3 with version 7.0
Works good
Looks good as well,but these guys charge more for their wallpapers than anyone,and they're definitely not the best out there.If you like this sorta thing this one works great,it should be combined with their 'Hellfire' wallpaper as a package for the price though.My bad for paying for it but I collect wallpapers and this one's alright.I like the faces in the fire,hard to make dark colors clear though,e.g.blue flame purple faces,or red and blue.The faces are hard to see when color is dark.

Shaun - March 13, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 4.0
I'm hooked...
I bought this to see what the hype was all about. It was the only one I found in the top new paid that was 5.0 stars. Im glad I did. Got to be the best one Ive found. The colors, the flames, interaction, performance, and quality is top notch. Who are you guys?
